name: CREATIV3
tag_list: networking, marketing, online, advertising, social, design, blog, webdesigner, digital
overview:
CREATIV3 is an interactive communications agency, created in Martinique in January 2010. Composed of a young and dynamic team, it offers its clients expertise in communications and marketing developed in three areas:

  1. Strategy and the Council
  2. Creation and Content
  3. The Media and SEO

For its two founders, Jean-Christophe and David MONDESIR CHARLERY, true fans of the web, the goal is to position and support the advertisers on digital media (ie all media including digital communication) by providing a communication strong, creative and tailored to their traditional communication.

Strand Strategy and Council for their service offering, involves the realization of strategic recommendations, social networking Internet, audit and benchmarking and the establishment of specifications.

Within the cluster and Content Creation, CREATIV3 offers customers the development of website and intranet application development for mobile web, blogs, pages on social networks, advertising on-screen and online, designing and writing content without forgetting the logo design and graphic design.

CREATIV3 also offers its services in SEO and media through the implementation of media planning, campaign management communication, referencing either natural or paid.

All these services rely on expertise in new technologies but also on being constantly attentive to market trends. As such, the agency has a blog (www.blogu3.fr) who tells the news in communications, web and advertising. One way to always be on standby and stay informed.

Among those who have already trusted CREATIV3 include MEDEF Martinique, Martinique Automobile (distributor of RENAULT, NISSAN …), CARIBBEAN SCOOP Ocean image, the ESU Foundation GBH and prescribers lagencdecom, CORIDA, Socarcom and independent

offices.address2: 11, rue des /Arts et Metiers / Lot. Dillon Stade
